Text.Page:
Those mercenaries are the least of the nagas. The {@LinkCreature:7#2#Naga Juggernauts} are much worse. They're extremely tough and brutal in ways you can't imagine.

Do your best to take out four of these monstrosities and bring me their heads. That will leave the survivors confused.

Take this fight seriously. It'll be much harder, but success that much sweeter.

Your skills are without peer. I wish the Mysterium employed more soldiers like you.

You've done a great service to us and a credit to yourself, . Thank you.
Did you take out the juggernauts yet? Does their blood fertilize these hallowed hills?
